title: Toxic Vs Terrible
body:
Which one would you rather have on your team (ranked)?

In my opinion, I'd rather have the toxic player. From what I've noticed, people who are toxic tend to care more about winning. There are exceptions obviously but this is what I can tell from my ranked experience. As long as someone pulls their own weight I don't care if they're flaming, so long as they don't just start inting. Mute exists for a reason.

People who play bad are whatever, it's just a bit annoying losing due to 1 or 2 players playing poorly when they clearly could have played better.
